title: Give your business a boost this Black Friday with top Dell Technologies deals
author: techradar-pro
summary: Dell's Black Friday sale is underway - here's all the best deals around for your SMB.
article: It's that time of year again, as Black Friday 2021 deals ushers in a wide range of deals and offers.

But it isn't just shoppers who can benefit from a great Black Friday deal - your business can too, making this the perfect time to refresh or supercharge your tech after what has been another challenging year.

So if you're looking to boost your workplace hardware, upgrade your home office, or enjoy a well-needed computing boost, Dell's Black Friday deals extravaganza is running from November 22 to 28 - including the company's Limited-Quantity deals, giving savings of up to 50% available for a limited time only - and free delivery on everything!

Among the most eye-catching deals is saving an incredible £1140 off the new Dell XPS 17 (was £2,687 now £1,547) which won a TechRadar Recommends award when we reviewed it earlier this year. Featuring a 10th generation Intel Core i7-10750H CPU, 16GB RAM & 1TB SSD, the new Dell XPS 17 is a super-powered addition to any workplace, offering top-end performance and reliability.
There's also huge savings on the new XPS 15, which is now just £1,235, and features a powerful Intel Core i7, 15.6in FHD+ display.

If you're looking for something a bit different, there's big savings on Dell's Vostro range, which packs all-day battery life, powerful hardware and a range of business-friendly tools such as fingerprint readers and dual storage options.

On offer, is a huge £300 off the Vostro 7500 (was £1,079 now £779) and over £225 off the Vostro 7510, which was £1,199 but can now be yours for just £971, making an ideal workplace companion for any business.

That's not all though, as Dell is offering up to 50% of all external monitors, allowing you and your business to boost productivity with big savings across the company's monitor range, from 24” compact displays ideal for a home office up to 86” interactive 4k conference monitors.

In addition to these savings, you can also pick up double Dell Rewards points with every purchase made during the Black Friday sales. These can then be redeemed against future purchases, offering you an even better deal - and if you aren’t a member yet, you can join now for free and receive a £30 Dell Rewards coupon for every £500 spent, to be redeemed against future purchases.
So don't delay - head to Dell's Black Friday deals page now and grab yourself a bargain before they're all gone!
